<h3 id="X39825">X(39825) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: KOSNITA TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*(2*S^4-((6*SA-SW)*R^2-2*SA^2+3*SB*SC)*S^2+(3*R^2-SW)*SA*SW^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39825) = 3*X(3)+X(13175) = 3*X(3)-X(39812) = 5*X(631)-X(39813) = X(9861)-5*X(16195) = X(13175)-3*X(39828) = 2*X(13175)+3*X(39831) = 3*X(14070)-X(39857) = 5*X(17821)-X(39820) = X(39812)+3*X(39828) = 2*X(39812)-3*X(39831) = 2*X(39828)+X(39831)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(39825) lies on these lines: {3,115}, {5,39818}, {15,39830}, {16,39829}, {22,38749}, {23,10722}, {24,114}, {26,2794}, {30,39845}, {35,39822}, {36,39815}, {98,7488}, {99,186}, {140,39816}, {148,10298}, {159,542}, {371,39824}, {372,39823}, {378,39809}, {389,39805}, {511,32661}, {543,18324}, {575,39819}, {578,39806}, {620,6644}, {631,39813}, {690,12893}, {1658,2782}, {2070,6033}, {2799,14270}, {2937,38741}, {3044,11464}, {3455,12188}, {3515,39803}, {3520,10723}, {5171,38553}, {5961,7502}, {5969,35228}, {6054,37940}, {6642,6721}, {6722,7514}, {7387,39841}, {7503,23514}, {7506,36519}, {7512,34473}, {7517,39838}, {7556,9862}, {8724,37922}, {8997,9682}, {9590,9864}, {9737,10311}, {9861,16195}, {10902,39821}, {10992,32534}, {11449,39807}, {12117,37941}, {13172,21844}, {13335,32654}, {13367,39817}, {13564,38742}, {14061,35921}, {14118,14639}, {15270,39644}, {17821,39820}, {17928,38748}, {18475,39834}, {18570,22515}, {18925,39804}, {19185,39814}, {19357,39810}, {19440,39826}, {19441,39827}, {21166,22467}, {22505,37440}, {33813,37814}, {34013,37958}, {37489,39839}</p>
<p>
X(39825) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 39828}, {7387, 39841}, {13175, 39812}<br>
X(39825) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (39816, 140), (39818, 5), (39819, 575), (39831, 3), (39854, 1658)<br>
X(39825) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 13175, 39812), (11464, 39808, 3044), (39812, 39828, 13175)<br>
</p>
